org.wso2.carbon.gateway.httploadbalancer.algorithm

Interface LoadBalancingAlgorithm

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SimpleAlgorithm, WeightedAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LeastResponseTime, Random, RoundRobin, StrictClientIPHashing, WeightedRandom, WeightedRoundRobin

    public interface LoadBalancingAlgorithm
    All types of LB algorithms must implement this interface. Algorithm implementation MUST ensure that all the operations are THREAD SAFE.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLBOutboundEndpoint(LBOutboundEndpoint lbOutboundEndpoint) 
      java.lang.Object getLock() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      LBOutboundEndpoint getNextLBOutboundEndpoint(org.wso2.carbon.messaging.CarbonMessage cMsg, LoadBalancerConfigContext context) 
      void removeLBOutboundEndpoint(LBOutboundEndpoint lbOutboundEndpoint) 
      void reset()
      Each implementation of LB algorithm will have certain values pertained to it.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of implemented LB algorithm.

      • addLBOutboundEndpoint

        void addLBOutboundEndpoint(LBOutboundEndpoint lbOutboundEndpoint)
        Parameters:
        lbOutboundEndpoint - outboundEndpoint to be added to the existing list.

        This method will be used to add an endpoint once it is back to healthy state.

      • removeLBOutboundEndpoint

        void removeLBOutboundEndpoint(LBOutboundEndpoint lbOutboundEndpoint)
        Parameters:
        lbOutboundEndpoint - outboundEndpoint to be removed from existing list.

        This method will be used to remove an unHealthyEndpoint.

      • getNextLBOutboundEndpoint

        LBOutboundEndpoint getNextLBOutboundEndpoint(org.wso2.carbon.messaging.CarbonMessage cMsg,
                                             LoadBalancerConfigContext context)
        Parameters:
        cMsg - Carbon Message has all headers required to make decision.
        context - LoadBalancerConfigContext.
        Returns:
        the next LBOutboundEndpoint according to implemented LB algorithm.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Each implementation of LB algorithm will have certain values pertained to it. (Eg: Round robin keeps track of index of OutboundEndpoint). Implementation of this method will resetHealthPropertiesToDefault.

      • getLock

        java.lang.Object getLock()
        Returns:
        Object used for locking.
